Sentencas: This paper describes an application of a NiMo-ceria-zirconia (NiMo-CZ) catalyst as a micro-reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on isooctane (i.e., a gasoline surrogate).
Titulo: NiMo-ceria-zirconia catalytic reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on a gasoline surrogate

Sentencas: The catalyst layer was applied on top of a conventional anode supported single cell with a configuration of Ni-yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anode, YSZ/Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 bi-layer electrolyte and La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta cathode.
Titulo: NiMo-ceria-zirconia catalytic reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on a gasoline surrogate

Sentencas: Our findings show that the application of the novel catalyst layer was an effective way to reform the mixture of isooctane and air into H-2 and CO, which facilitated the electrochemical oxidation of complex hydrocarbons at the anode.
Titulo: NiMo-ceria-zirconia catalytic reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on a gasoline surrogate

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the single cell with the micro-reforming layer exhibited a low polarization resistance of 1.36 Omega cm(2) and a maximum power density of 405 mW cm(-2) in the direct feeding condition of an isooctane/air mixture.
Titulo: NiMo-ceria-zirconia catalytic reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on a gasoline surrogate

Sentencas: At the current density of 500 mA cm(-2), the cell voltage presented a fairly low degradation rate of 3.0 mV h(-1) during a 12 h stability test.
Titulo: NiMo-ceria-zirconia catalytic reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on a gasoline surrogate

Sentencas: The excellent electrochemical performance suggests the high catalytic activity of the NiMo-CZ catalyst layer for reforming isooctane and suppressing degradation of the single cell in the direct feeding of isooctane/air.
Titulo: NiMo-ceria-zirconia catalytic reforming layer for solid oxide fuel cells running on a gasoline surrogate
